Lavender Lemonade: A candy that combines the sweet and tangy taste of lemonade with the calming and floral taste of lavender. It would be perfect for those who want to relax and indulge in something sweet.

Mint Chocolate Chip: A candy that blends the cool and refreshing taste of mint with the rich and creamy taste of chocolate chips. It would be perfect for those who want to satisfy their sweet tooth while also getting a little bit of minty freshness.
Spicy Cinnamon: A candy that combines the warm and comforting taste of cinnamon with a hint of spice. It would be perfect for those who want to indulge in something sweet and warm.

Strawberry Cheesecake: A candy that combines the sweet and creamy taste of cheesecake with the juicy and sweet taste of strawberries. It would be perfect for those who want to satisfy their sweet tooth while also getting a little bit of fruitiness.
Lemon Ginger: A candy that combines the tart and tangy taste of lemon with the spicy and warm taste of ginger. It would be perfect for those who want to indulge in something sweet and spicy.
